eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
S_{BI}&\simeq&-T_p \int d^{p+1}x\ \sqrt{-det(\eta_{ab}+
2\pi\ls^2\,F_{ab})}
\label{expandp}\\
&\simeq&-T_p \int d^{p+1}x\ \left(1+{(2\pi\ls^2)^2\over4} F^2
+ (2\pi\ls^2)^4 F^4 + (2\pi\ls^2)^6 F^6 + \cdots\right)
\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2&=&-\left(1+{r^2\over L^2}\right)dt^2+{dr^2\over
1+{r^2\over L^2}}+r^2 d\Omega_{3}^2
\label{metric}\\
&&\qquad\qquad\qquad+
L^2\left(d\theta^2+\cos^2\theta d\phi^2+\sin^2\theta
d\widetilde{\Omega}_{3}^2\right)\ .
\nonumber
\
